resources.string: Minesweeper is a game about clearing a minefield by identifying mines with flags. To begin the game, click on a square. Your first click will never be on a mine. The map will be revealed along with numbers on the grid. The number in a revealed square indicates the number of adjacent mines. To place a flag, long click on an unrevealed square. Reveal every square not occupied by bombs to win the game.
Created by Alex Weaver and Tony Tian
